title: AURF
body: SO UNFAIR {{champion:32}} CANT EVEN PLAY URF! STUPID GAME COMES OUT AFTER I LEAVE TO GO BACK TO SCHOOL! RIOT WHY THE HELL WOULD YOU LET IT COME OUT ON A MONDAY FFS

replies.body: I think it may be Tuesday in OCE
ill fuck them up if it is

First of all, don't swear. 

Second, It is tomorrow. Will be somewhat 6am when the events should unlock. 

If it is on Tuesday, then that wouldn't make sense. I still don't get why they make us wait 6 days... Some stupid ideas Riot comes up with.
Well clearly Riot don't make sense cause it still ain't out
Even though events and thingy was unlocked, they made everyone wait so NA gets to unlock it the same time as us. Makes literally no sense to do it in this fashion, just a dick move on their end.
Yeah pretty dog cause they use to actually release it for every time zone but now it revolves around NA
I have a feeling it will be around 8pm (WA time) tonight, as they usually release skins and champions in the store around then.
